X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The total number of requests in a given time window.

id.description: The hashed id of the recurring expense

user_id.description: The hashed id of the user who created the recurring expense

assigned_user_id.description: The hashed id of the user assigned to this recurring expense

client_id.description: The hashed id of the client

invoice_id.description: The hashed id of the invoice

bank_id.description: The id of the bank associated with this recurring expense

invoice_currency_id.description: The currency id of the invoice associated with this recurring expense

expense_currency_id.description: The currency id of the expense associated with this recurring expense

invoice_category_id.description: The category id of the invoice

public_notes.example: This is the best client in the world

transcation_id.description: The transaction id of the recurring expense

amount.description: The total amount of the recurring expense

frequency_id.description: The frequency this recurring expense fires

remaining_cycles.description: The number of remaining cycles for this recurring expense

foreign_amount.description: The foreign currency amount of the recurring expense

exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate for the expernse

payment_date.description: The date the expense was paid

should_be_invoiced.description: Boolean flag determining if the expense should be invoiced

is_deleted.description: Boolean flag determining if the recurring expense is deleted

last_sent_date.description: The Date it was sent last

invoice_documents.description: Boolean flag determining if the documents associated with this expense should be passed onto the invoice if it is converted to an invoice

calculate_tax_by_amount.description: Flag indicating whether to calculate tax based on amount rather than percentage

category_id.description: The unique identifier of the expense category

currency_id.description: The unique identifier of the currency

next_send_date_client.description: The next scheduled send date for the client

number.description: The unique number assigned to this recurring expense

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project associated with this recurring expense

tax_amount1.description: The amount of the first tax

tax_amount2.description: The amount of the second tax

tax_amount3.description: The amount of the third tax

transaction_id.description: The unique identifier of the transaction

uses_inclusive_taxes.description: Flag indicating whether taxes are included in the price

vendor_id.description: The unique identifier of the vendor associated with this recurring expense

message.description: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
message.example: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
